languages.text: "Я — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, влады{mf|ка|чица} Торгового Патента и помазанн{mf|ик|ица} Императора, и ты не посмеешь отвергнуть великую честь присягнуть мне на верность и вершить мою волю!"
"I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"
languages.original_text: "Я — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, влады{mf|ка|чица} Торгового Патента и помазанн{mf|ик|ица} Императора, и ты не посмеешь отвергнуть великую честь присягнуть мне на верность и вершить мою волю!"

traits.locale_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"
"I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"
"I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"
"I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

languages.text: “我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，贸易授状的持有者，帝皇的神选者。我允许你宣誓向我效忠，按照我的意愿行事，我不允许你拒绝这至高无上的荣誉！”
languages.original_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

traits.locale_text: “我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，贸易许可证的持有者，帝皇的神选者。我允许你宣誓向我效忠，按照我的意愿行事，我不允许你拒绝这至高无上的荣誉！”

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque et {mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. Je vous interdis de refuser l'immense honneur de me jurer allégeance et d'accomplir ma volonté ! »
languages.original_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque et {mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. Je vous interdis de refuser l'immense honneur de me jurer allégeance et d'accomplir ma volonté ! »

languages.text: «Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, portador{mf||a} de la Patente de Comercio y ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador. ¡No te atrevas a rechazar el tremendo honor de jurarme lealtad y cumplir mi voluntad!».
languages.original_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

traits.locale_text: «Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, portador{mf||a} de la Patente de Comercio y ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador. ¡No te atrevas a rechazar el tremendo honor de jurarme lealtad y cumplir mi voluntad!».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、通商許可証の持ち主であり、皇帝に聖別されし者である。{mf|俺|私}に忠誠を誓い、我が意志を実行するという、計り知れぬ栄誉を拒むでない！」
languages.original_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、通商許可証の持ち主であり、皇帝に聖別されし者である。{mf|俺|私}に忠誠を誓い、我が意志を実行するという、計り知れぬ栄誉を拒むでない！」

languages.text: "Ich bin {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Inhaber des Handelsbriefs und Auserwähtler|Inhaberin des Handelsbriefs und Auserwählte} des Imperators — wagt es ja nicht, die immense Ehre abzulehnen, mir die Treue zu schwören und meinen Willen zu befolgen!"
languages.original_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Inhaber des Handelsbriefs und Auserwähtler|Inhaberin des Handelsbriefs und Auserwählte} des Imperators — wagt es ja nicht, die immense Ehre abzulehnen, mir die Treue zu schwören und meinen Willen zu befolgen!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'um ben. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin Hamili ve İmparator'un kutsanmışıyım! Büyük bir şerefle bana bağlılık yemini edip irademe boyun eğmen için fırsat ayağına gelmiş, sakın tepeyim deme!"
languages.original_text: "I am Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, bearer of the Warrant of Trade and the Emperor's anointed — do not dare reject the immense honour of swearing allegiance to me and doing my will!"

traits.locale_text: "Ticari Ruhsatname'nin hamilili ve İmparator'un kutsanmışı Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'um ben! Büyük bir şerefle bana bağlılık yemini edip irademe boyun eğmen için fırsat ayağına gelmiş, sakın ola tepeyim deme!"
